title: Mattikkiten Lyrics Padai Veeran
stanzas:
haiyyaiyo Mattikkiten
unkitta maatikitten
valikkaama kaattikitten
kanavedhu nijamedhu
theriyala

nee enna suththi vitta
engengo paththa vachacha
kannukkul kaththi vachcha
killi killi paathapinnum
puriyala..

sanda poatu paathiruppa
sandhi kuthira saanji ninnu
paathiyaa

kaththi pesi pathiruppa
kalli poovu kannadichu
paathiyaa

a kokku nee
un kezhuththi naan
enai koththi kotharida
kaththi katharida
kammaa karaiyila
yaemaa nuzhaiyira nee

haiyyaiyo Mattikkita
unkitta maatikitta
valikkaama kaattikitta
kanavedhu nijamedhu
theriyala

nee unna suththi vitten
engengo paththa vachachen
kannukkul kaththi vachchen
kannukkul kaththi vachchen
puriyala..

pongi thirinja pottapulla.
ponnaa paathaa nenjukulla
nikkuraa

panju virinja kaattukulla
kanniponnu kanga thookki
vaikkuraa

naan singaari
en sirippu thee
en pattu seelaiya
suththi erinthida
valaiyaa vizhuguthu
dhisaiyaa maraikuthadaa

enkitta sakthiyilla
unnapol puthiyilla
thirudittaa pottapulla
kanda kanda kanavula
alaiyuren

kolasaami kovilukku
kurumbaadu naenthu vitten
kaappaatha vaendikitten
thidai edhu vazhi edhu
theriyala

seo.title: Mattikkiten Lyrics Padai Veeran
seo.description: Get the complete Mattikkiten Lyrics Padai Veeran Read the lyrics penned by Dhana and composed by Karthik Raja and sung by Haricharan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Dhana, Karthik Raja, Haricharan, Rita, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
